name: Tymon Kozłowski
story: Tymon Kozłowski was born and raised in Poland. He joined the military at the age of 18 and served as a sharpshooter in the Polish Armed Forces for 10 years before being recruited by the Independent faction in Arma 3. He is known for his exceptional marksmanship skills and his ability to remain calm under pressure. Tymon is a man of few words and prefers to let his actions speak for themselves.
